short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool to scrape AirBnB listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are interested in saving AirBnB listings while browsing their map, this is the right tool for you. By simply moving around the map, our plugin will collect all listings you encountered and make them downloadable to you via a CSV file. We are still trying to improve the plugin. Please let us know if you need some additional fields or functionality.
